alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 11:56PM EST until January 11 at 5:31PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .Recent heavy rains in the Wabash River basin are expected to cause rises in the river which will result in a week or more of minor flooding at New Harmony. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY, JANUARY 11... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Tuesday, January 11. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, The river overflows low ground on the Illinois side. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 16.8 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, January 11. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
